title: Respond to an Ethics Hotline Report
description: An anonymous report has been submitted through the ethics hotline alleging fraudulent expense reporting by a manager.

tasks.description: Receive the anonymous report from the ethics hotline system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The compliance officer receives the case details.

tasks.description: Initiate a confidential investigation, partnering with internal audit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer creates a new investigation case and engages the internal audit team.

tasks.description: Review the manager's expense reports for the last year to look for anomalies.
tasks.expected_outcome: The investigation team analyzes the expense reports for policy violations.
